backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor with access control managing products, customers, bills, expenses, and user profiles in in-memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files and components related to packaging the PWA into an Android APK.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions for build planning.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android build artifacts, IDE files, logs, and generated folders.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android app module Gradle config defining SDK versions, build types, Kotlin settings, and dependencies.
frontend/android/app/proguard-rules.pro: ProGuard configuration preserving WebView, Kotlin metadata, and wrapper app classes.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Manifest specifying permissions, MainActivity setup, app theme, and deep-link handling.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/f: MainActivity implementing fullscreen WebView wrapper with navigation handling, dark mode, and file upload support.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Color resource defining launcher background color.
App string resources including app name, PWA URL, and error messages.
App themes defining colors, fullscreen mode, and styling for MainActivity.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle config declaring Kotlin and Android Gradle plugin versions.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Gradle settings enabling AndroidX, parallel builds, caching, and R8 full mode.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Gradle wrapper configuration pointing to Gradle 8.2 distribution.
frontend/android/README.md: Instructions for building the Android wrapper APK for the PWA, including prerequisites and Gradle usage.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Project settings specifying repositories and including the app module.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet for the frontend (content not shown).
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point that sets PWA metadata, registers the service worker, and mounts the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata, launch settings, and app icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling install, activate, caching, and fetch logic for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow and rendering screens based on user state.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing sidebar, top bar, main content area, and footer around screen content.
frontend/src/components/CustomerDialog.t: Modal form for creating or updating customers with offline queue support and basic validation.
frontend/src/components/ProductDialog.ts: Modal for adding or editing products with validation and support for offline queue actions.
frontend/src/components/SideNav.tsx: Sidebar navigation component listing app screens and handling screen switching.
frontend/src/components/SyncIndicator.ts: UI indicator showing online status, pending sync actions, sync progress, and errors.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Top bar showing title, sync indicator, install button, user profile, and logout control.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login/logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Handles PWA installation prompts, tracking installability and triggering the install flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, customers, bills, profiles, and expenses via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers, color variables, dark mode styles, and print styles for invoices.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/offline/storage.ts: Implements localStorage-based caching and an offline action queue with retry metadata.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflineQueue.ts: Provides a hook to execute actions immediately or queue them offline when execution fails.
frontend/src/offline/useSyncStatus.ts: Tracks online status and processes queued offline actions, syncing them through the backend actor.
frontend/src/screens/BillingScreen.tsx: UI for creating bills with product selection, quantity handling, GST options, and inventory validation.
frontend/src/screens/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays per-customer credit totals and statuses using bills and customer data.
frontend/src/screens/CustomersScreen.tsx: Lists customers and supports creating, editing, and deleting entries with offline queueing.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Shows high-level stats for products, customers, bills, credits, and sync status.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and optional user profile setup with name and role.
frontend/src/screens/ProductsScreen.tsx: Displays a products list with add, edit, and delete actions using queries and an offline queue.
frontend/src/screens/ReportsScreen.tsx: Generates sales, expense, and profit reports with date filtering and supports adding and deleting expenses.
frontend/src/utils/billingTotals.ts: Provides functions to calculate billing totals including GST and compute totals from stored bills.
frontend/src/utils/printInvoice.ts: Builds printable invoice HTML by consolidating bill items and calculating totals for printing.
frontend/src/utils/reporting.ts: Contains reporting helpers for daily sales, date-range summaries, and profit calculations using bills, expenses, and products.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color system, extended theming, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project's state, including versioning, architectural notes, features, and summaries for an Android inventory and billing app.
